message.name: ERR_FV_NAME_NOT_SPECIFIED
message.locale: The office member name must be specified.

message.name: ERR_FV_NAME_MODIFY
message.locale: The office member name cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_XRV_PROFILE_NOT_ALLOWED
message.locale: A profile of "%1s" can only be selected if the external party verification indicator is set.

message.name: ERR_XRV_DUPLICATE_OFFICE_MEMBER
message.locale: An office member with the same user name and profile already exists for this external party office.
